title: Striver's SDE Sheet - Top Coding Interview Problems
description: SDE Sheet contains handpicked top coding interview questions from different topics of Data Structures & Algorithms. These problems are among the most asked in interviews at Google, Amazon, Microsoft, Facebook, Swiggy, Flipkart, etc., and cover almost all essential DSA concepts.

problems.title: Merge Two Sorted Arrays Without Extra Space
Find the Repeating and Missing Number
Count Subarrays with Given XOR K
Remove Nth Node From End of List
Delete Node in a Linked List O(1)
Find the intersection point of Y Linked Lists
Detect a Loop in Linked List
Reverse Linked List in Groups of K
Check if Linked List is Palindrome
Find the Starting Point of Loop in Linked List
Clone a Linked List with Random Pointer
Minimum Number of Platforms Required for a Railway
Single Element in a Sorted Array
Kth Element of Two Sorted Arrays
Check if Two Trees are Identical
Construct Binary Tree from Preorder and Inorder
Construct Binary Tree from Postorder and Inorder
Flatten Binary Tree to Linked List
Inorder Successor and Predecessor in BST
Detect Cycle in Undirected Graph using BFS
Detect Cycle in Undirected Graph using DFS
Detect Cycle in Directed Graph using DFS
Maximum XOR With an Element From Array
